place.name: BISHOPTON
place.gazetteerText: BISHOPTON, a hamlet and a chapelry in Old Stratford parish, Warwick. The hamlet lies adjacent to the Stratford and Avon canal, 2 miles NW of Stratford-on-Avon. Pop., 51.—The chapelry is a p. curacy in the diocese of Worcester; in the patronage of the Vicar of Stratford; the statistics not reported. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
